attributes.action: Build a third road off Canvey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to consider a much needed 3rd road on Canvey, we have suffered long enough. With close to 50,000 people on the Island we need this nightmare to end, and soon.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Build a third road off Canvey."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15369.asp

Prime Minister's Office
